description: Largest prime substring in 7^n (0 if none).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: lpss[n_]:=Module[{idn7=IntegerDigits[7^n]},Max[Select[Flatten[ Table[ FromDigits/@ Partition[idn7,i,1],{i,Length[idn7]}]],PrimeQ]]]; Array[ lpss,25,0]/.-\[Infinity]->0 (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 17 2013 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
